rows.label: tlk70000070_90_msg0002
rows.name:
Oh, so the repairs to Lett Bridge are
finished, are they?

rows.label: tlk70000070_90_msg0003
rows.name:
We were a sleepy village to begin with,
but after the bridge fell our trickle of
visitors dried up completely.

rows.label: tlk70000070_90_msg0005
rows.name:
Say, if you're planning on crossing
the Dannagh Desert from here, it'd be
a good idea to rest up in the inn first.

rows.label: tlk70000070_90_msg0006
rows.name:
It's tough out there in the desert.
Even for strong Drivers and Blades...
